      • addPatterns

        public static void addPatterns(Properties properties)
        This method takes a reads all key-value pairs where the key starts with DATA_MASKING_REGEX_PREFIX and adds them to a data masking list.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to provide

      • addPattern

        public static void addPattern(String nameOfPattern,
                              String regexAsString)
        Add a new pattern for masking data. If you don't provide a name for the pattern, it will be the index of pattern in the list of masking patterns.
        Parameters:
        nameOfPattern - the name of the pattern
        regexAsString - the pattern to add

      • removePatterns

        public static void removePatterns()
        Removes all patterns
